Get chromosome arm bins

Source: R/bin_utils.R
get_chr_arm_bins.Rd

Get chromosome arm bins

Usage

get_chr_arm_bins(genome = "hg38", calc_gc = FALSE, bs_genome = NULL)

Arguments

genome

Genome version ('hg38', 'hg19')

calc_gc

Logical: Whether or not to calculate GC content per bin

bs_genome

BSgenome object. Must be passed if calc_gc is set to TRUE

Value

A GRanges object of chromosome arm bins

Examples

bins <- get_chr_arm_bins("hg38")
